[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/foundation-login](./foundation-login.md) &gt; [Settings](./foundation-login.settings.md)

## Settings type

Defines the parameters you set on the /login route.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Settings = {
    public?: boolean;
    autoConnect?: boolean;
    defaultRedirectUrl?: string;
    hideLogo?: boolean;
    logoSrc?: string;
    logoWidth?: string;
    logoHeight?: string;
    usernameLabel?: string;
    resetPassword?: boolean;
    requestAccount?: boolean;
    forgotPassword?: boolean;
    ssoToggle?: boolean;
    ssoEnable?: boolean;
    allowAutoAuth?: boolean;
};
```

## Remarks

See the example in the [Login](./foundation-login.login.md) class in the `configure` method for usage.

All parameters are Optional.

public - boolean, controls whether the user has to be logged in to view.<br/> autoConnect - boolean, controls whether the front-end attempts to connect to the server automatically or whether the user needs to click a connect button.<br/> defaultRedirectUrl - string, the fallback URL which the user is forwarded to after they are redirected back from an SSO provider.<br/> <br/> hideLogo - boolean, controls whether to show or hide the logo on the different screens (login, reset password, etc.).<br/> logoSrc - string, contains the source of an `<img />` which defines the logo<br/> logoWidth - string, controls the styling `width` of the logo<br/> logoHeight - string, controls the styling `height` of the logo<br/> <br/> usernameLabel - string, sets the label of the login form username field (prompt for Username or Email).<br/> <br/> resetPassword - boolean, controls whether the password reset screen is enabled<br/> requestAccount - boolean, controls whether the request account screen is enabled<br/> forgotPassword - boolean, controls whether the forgotten password screen is enabled<br/> <br/> ssoToggle - boolean, enables the SSO journey as an option<br/> ssoEnable - boolean, controls whether the user has checked to attempt an SSO journey<br/> <br/> allowAutoAuth - boolean, would be used to control whether to automatically log the user in if they have a valid session. Needs to manually be enabled in the NavigationContributor (see \[2\] in the example in the [Login](./foundation-login.login.md) class).<br/>
